author: By KEN MORITSUGU Associated Press
title: China to lift lockdown in most of virus-hit Hubei province
description: BEIJING (AP) — Chinese authorities announced Tuesday they would end a two-month lockdown of most of virus-hit Hubei province at midnight.
content:
BEIJING (AP) Chinese authorities announced Tuesday they would end a two-month lockdown of most of virus-hit Hubei province at midnight.
People with a clean bill of health will be allowed to leave, the provincial government said. The city of Wuhan, where the … [+979 chars]
